languages.text: "Мастеру дисциплины не кажется странным, что он себя оговаривает, да еще и так нелепо?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
languages.original_text: "Мастеру дисциплины не кажется странным, что он себя оговаривает, да еще и так нелепо?"

traits.locale_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
"Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

languages.text: « La capitaine d'armes ne trouve-t-elle pas étrange que le suspect soit aussi prompt à se déclarer hérétique et à se donner ainsi en spectacle ? »
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

traits.locale_text: « La capitaine d'armes ne trouve-t-elle pas étrange que le suspect soit aussi prompt à se déclarer hérétique et à se donner ainsi en spectacle ? »

languages.text: «Maestra de armas, ¿no le resulta extraño que el sospechoso tenga tantas ganas de declararse hereje? Y de forma tan ridícula, además».
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

traits.locale_text: «Maestra de armas, ¿no le resulta extraño que el sospechoso tenga tantas ganas de declararse hereje? Y de forma tan ridícula, además».

languages.text: “这个嫌疑犯这么急切地把自己描绘成异端分子，还是以这么荒谬的方式，难道我的戒律大师就不觉得奇怪吗？”
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

traits.locale_text: “这个嫌疑犯这么急切地把自己描绘成异端分子，还是以这么荒谬的方式，难道我的戒律大师就不觉得奇怪吗？”

languages.text: 「容疑者が自分を異端者に仕立て上げようとしているのを見て、マスター・アット・アームズは不思議に思わないのですか？ましてや、このようなとんでもないやり方で？」
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

traits.locale_text: 「容疑者が自分を異端者に仕立て上げようとしているのを見て、マスター・アット・アームズは不思議に思わないのですか？ましてや、このようなとんでもないやり方で？」

languages.text: "Findet die Master-at-Arms es nicht eigenartig, dass der Verdächtige sich gar so bereitwillig als Ketzer darstellt? Und auch noch auf solch hanebüchene Weise?"
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"

traits.locale_text: "Findet die Master-at-Arms es nicht eigenartig, dass der Verdächtige sich gar so bereitwillig als Ketzer darstellt? Und auch noch auf solch hanebüchene Weise?"

languages.text: "Silahtar, şüphelinin kendini kâfir olarak göstermekte bu kadar hevesli olmasını tuhaf bulmuyor mu? Hem de böylesine akıl almaz bir şekilde!"
languages.original_text: "Does the Master-at-Arms not find it strange that the suspect is so eager to paint himself as a heretic? And in such a preposterous fashion, no less?"
